channel.title: Castle Wars - Barricade "Light" Option
channel.description:
I am working on coding Castle Wars and currently my barricades are facing two problems.
1. How do I make them burn longer? (Where should I look?) 2. How do I give them a right click "light" option? - I want them to have a right click light option like regular firemaking logs, yet do not want them to have a burn animation (as in attempting to light it with the tinderbox). I want them to light immediately. How can I make them light immediately instead of having the animation? I'm currently looking at firemaking.java and trying to add barricades there. Please let me know if I should not be looking here!
Yes, I am new and have a lot to learn. Not asking to be spoonfed, just looking for some guidance.
Thanks in advance guys!

item.title: Castle Wars - Barricade "Light" Option
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st

item.title: Castle Wars - Barricade "Light" Option
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

To make it last longer, use either a cycle or event handler. For an extra option on an object, look in ObjectDef client sided. Under: class46.readValues(stream);
You could add a switch statement for “i” or just have an if statement for the object ID. if (i == OBJECT_ID) { class46.actions = new String[5]; class46.actions = new String[] { null, null, "Light barricade", null, null }; class46.name = "Barricade"; }

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars - Barricade "Light" Option
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

I am working on coding Castle Wars and currently my barricades are facing two problems.

  1. How do I make them burn longer? (Where should I look?)
  2. How do I give them a right click “light” option?
  • I want them to have a right click light option like regular firemaking logs, yet do not want them to have a burn animation (as in attempting to light it with the tinderbox). I want them to light immediately. How can I make them light immediately instead of having the animation?
    I’m currently looking at firemaking.java and trying to add barricades there. Please let me know if I should not be looking here!

Yes, I am new and have a lot to learn. Not asking to be spoonfed, just looking for some guidance.

Thanks in advance guys!

Read full topic
